body.p:
Hopkinsville Ky the 8 July 1863
Gov, Robinson

This wil be handed to you by Mr S. M. Bernard a citizen of this Town, who has some business to present to your Excelency. The Nature of his business he wil explain. Mr Bernard is a gentleman whoes statements are reguarded as entirely reliable in this community where he is best known, and you may receive them as entitled to credit & your favourable consideration, if you find the matter he presents meritorious
